alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:23AM CDT until October 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for hot and windy conditions, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 90. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * SEVERITY... FUELS (ERC)...25th-49th percentile...2 (out of 5). WEATHER...Critical...3 (out of 5). FIRE ENVIRONMENT...5 (out of 10).
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Dewey; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward
